association_score.method: Moderated t-statistics computed with limma version 3.16.8. Independent filtering performed using genefilter version 1.46.1, with gene variances as filter statistic. p-values adjusted using Benjamini & Hochberg (1995) FDR correction. By default, significant differential expression called if adjusted p <= 0.05.
